thread.section_title: Watchex Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Watchex | watchex.ca
thread.title: Tom

author: Tom
title: Tom
text:
This is the first online review I have ever written - but I want to see Watchex survive and thrive. I have no connection with them except for having sold Kevin an IWC watch last week. I could not bring myself to send a $30k watch to someone I did not know. It wasn't too hard for me to get there so I hopped a short flight and met Kevin after considering his offer based on my pics. Everything went just fine. I'm happy with the price.
Kevin, do clean up your website. Too many links that go nowhere, it does not inspire confidence. You need to get people to trust you and a totally solid website will help. A website with dead links hurts (in my mind) quite a bit.
That said, I'm really happy with the transaction. When/if I need to part with another piece you'll be the first one I call.
